achievement.title: 5-star rating in python ans 3-star rating in java on Hackerrank Coding Platform
achievement.description: I've attained a 5-star rating in Python and a 3-star rating in Java on HackerRank, showcasing my strong problem-solving skills and language proficiency. These achievements reflect my dedication to mastering programming languages and my ability to excel in competitive coding environments, making them valuable assets to my portfolio.

achievement.title: Leetcode 50 days Badge
achievement.description: I've earned the prestigious LeetCode 50 Days Badge, signifying my dedication to honing my coding skills and problem-solving abilities. Over the course of 50 consecutive days, I've tackled a diverse range of coding challenges, demonstrating perseverance, consistency, and a commitment to continuous improvement. This achievement reflects my readiness to tackle complex programming problems and showcases my preparedness for technical interviews and real-world coding scenarios.

achievement.title: PostMan API student fundamentals expert
achievement.description: As a certified Postman API Student Fundamentals Expert, I possess comprehensive knowledge and practical skills in leveraging the Postman platform to design, test, and document APIs effectively. Through rigorous training and hands-on experience, I have mastered the fundamentals of API development, including request and response handling, authentication methods, and API testing automation. With this expertise, I am equipped to streamline the API development process, enhance collaboration among development teams, and ensure the seamless integration of APIs into software applications.
